title: Create a Honeymoon Package
description: A couple wants to book a romantic honeymoon package in Hawaii, including flights, a luxury resort, a private dinner, and a helicopter tour.

tasks.description: Gather the couple's travel dates and preferences.
Search for and select components for the package: flights, a 5-star resort, a helicopter tour, and a restaurant for the private dinner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds high-quality, available options for all components.

tasks.description: Create a detailed itinerary, price the complete package, and present it to the couple.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds a comprehensive honeymoon package with a total price.
